text: Andrée Marcelle Henriette Parisy (4 December 1935 - 27 April 2014), better known by her stage names Andréa Parisy and sometimes Andrée Parizy, was a French actress. She is best known for her roles in movies such as Babes a GoGo (1956), The Little Bather (1968) and Mayerling (1968). She was born in Levallois-Perret. Parisy died on 27 April 2014, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:Burials at Père Lachaise Cemetery Category:Disease-related deaths in France
title: Andréa Parisy
